cPrePathCreateNotification Class Reference

This notification is fired at the top of cGate::connectTo() on the owner modules of the start AND end gates of the future connection path that will be created when the gate gets connected. More...

#include <cmodelchange.h>

Inheritance diagram for cPrePathCreateNotification:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

This notification is fired at the top of cGate::connectTo() on the owner modules of the start AND end gates of the future connection path that will be created when the gate gets connected.

See cPathChangeNotification for more details.
